info.name: New Pact Boons
info.description: The New Pact Boons from Valda's Spire of Secrets
info.author: Valda's Spire of Secrets

description.p: As a bonus action, you can summon a cloak, coat, or robe which aids your movement and mobility. This pact cloak appears on your body, fitting over any other clothes or armor, and it doesn't impede your movement, vision, or your ability to wear other equipment. While wearing your pact cloak, you constantly float a few inches off the ground. You ignore the effects of difficult terrain, your speed increases by 10 feet, and you can walk across fluid surfaces such as water and quicksand.
You can dismiss your pact cloak as a bonus action.

description.p: Your patron grants you a mote of chaotic, otherworldly power. Your spell attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

sheet.description: Your spell attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

description.p: You give yourself over completely to your patron, taking on greater aspects of your benefactor in exchange for more power. Your skin changes to reflect this, changing form and becoming more resistant to damage. When you take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage from a nonmagical attack that isn't silvered, you can subtract 3 from the damage taken.

description.p: You can cast might of the abyss once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

description.p: You can cast the blood print spell at will, without expending a spell slot.

description.p: When you cast a cantrip that requires one or more ranged spell attacks, you can make melee spell attacks instead.

description.p: Your patron grants you the power to fly: this manifests as a pair of wings (of varying types), a dark aura, or some other sign appropriate to your patron. While you aren't wearing medium or heavy armor, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.

sheet.description: While you aren't wearing medium or heavy armor, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.

description.p: You can cast protect threshold at will, without expending a spell slot or material components. The spell ends early if you use this invocation to cast the spell again.

sheet.description: When you cast eldritch blast, add {{agonizing blast:damage}} to the damage it deals on a hit.

description.p: You can cast misty step without using a spell slot by vanishing into your pact cloak, leaving behind a cloud of smoke. You can use this invocation a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (a minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

element.prerequisite: eldritch blast cantrip, Pact of the Flame feature

description.p: When you roll a 10 on the damage die for your eldritch blast, you can roll an additional d10 and add its damage to the total, rolling again if this die is also a 10, and so on. You can roll a total number of four damage dice for this damage roll, or eight damage dice on a critical hit.

sheet.description: When you roll a 10 on the damage die for your eldritch blast, you can roll an additional d10 and add its damage to the total, rolling again on a 10, up to a total of 4d10 (8d10 on a critical hit).

description.p: As an action, you can set off an uncontrolled magic spark to cast a random spell. Spend a warlock spell slot and roll on the following table. Each entry gives a list of spells from a particular school of magic; you must choose to cast one of the spells from the list rolled using your warlock spell slot, without consuming expensive material components. New spells are marked with an asterisk.

td.i: Aid, protection from energy, stoneskin, antilife shell.
Web, conjure animals, dimension door, cloudkill.
Detect thoughts, geomantic discernment,* divination, scrutinize foe*
Suggestion, curse of blades,* confusion, hold monster
Gust of wind, fireball, ice storm, wall of force.
Mirror image, major image, greater invisibility, seeming.
Ray of enfeeblement, bestow curse, blight, contagion.
Heat metal, haste, polymorph, animate objects.
